description.@en: The person you gaze at begins to twist and break in place as theyâ€™re exposed to this heinous spell.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you immediately cause an Injury to the person you look at, as well as on each of the following Turns. Although you do not lower their Damage Condition Track, they will suffer a Moderate Injury on your first Turn, a Serious Injury on your second Turn and a Grievous Injury on your third Turn. This Magick requires Concentration.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but instead the foe suffers a Serious Injury instead of a Moderate Injury.

criticalFailure.@en: Staring long and deep into the eyes of your victim, you momentarily are taken by the inhumanity of this act. As you break the bone the first time, you immediately suffer a Moderate Injury. Again, you then suffer a Serious Injury. And finally, a Grievous Injury. You cannot help but break the bone thrice, despite the pain.

reagents.@en: The leg bone of a priest, which must be thrice-broken (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can see
